message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start!
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor. How about a 55/45 split?
Meet in the middle of our previous offers, 57-43 is fair!
We're running out of time, and the value is decreasing.  I'll meet you closer to the middle with a 52.5/47.5 split.
Come on, Bob, the value is decreasing fast for me. Let's settle on 58-42!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Every round is costing you thousands.  I'll take a slight hit at 51/49 just to end this.
